comment: Horrible professor and legit the worse one I have ever had.

I had her for African American Literature and English 1102. The course load was many mini readings such as poems and short stories. These were used to write the reading response assignments, which are very easy. There are two big essay assignments for each class but they are only about 6-8 pages. As long as you talk in class you will be fine.

Professor Walker is very funny and personable, as well as well-versed and professional in her subject. She engages with the class personally, is very lenient with due dates, but sometimes unclear with assignments in the online portal.
As long as you talk you will have a good time in this class.
Very laidback teacher. Not a very tough grader, and incredibly lenient with due dates. If you talk to her and interact with her lectures, it will be the best class you take in college.
She isn't a harsh grader and gives you extra days to complete your assignment. She's easygoing and funny.
